About

I'm a full-stack JavaScript web developer who specializes in the latest HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and the Node.js JavaScript runtime. Some of the tools I use include Jade, Stylus, and Mithril.

I maintain a low-traffic, infrequently updated blog full of whatever ramblings come across my head, mostly technical stuff, but occasionally less professional topics such as religion or random things I stumble across or think of. Also, I enjoy reading IFLScience and BuzzFeed, and when I can find time not spent coding or doing other things, I occasionally play music, mostly improvised, on my keyboard.

Also, once upon a time (read: middle and high school), I loved to create music. This mostly predates my coding days, and as much as I wish I could continue creating, I sadly don't have nearly the time available I used to. It no longer reflects my current musical style, but in case you're curious, you can still find my old songs here.

If you want to contact me, you can always use the contact form here on this site, or if you would prefer, you can also find me here:

  • LinkedIn –  View Isiah Meadows's profile
  • Twitter – Follow @isiahmeadows1
